mapper.insert: insert into xm_customsharings (shared, sharingstype, tabid, whoshared, sharingsid) values (#{shared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sharingstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tabid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{whoshared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sharingsid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into xm_customsharings
shared,
sharingstype,
tabid,
whoshared,
sharingsid,

mapper.select: select DISTINCT(sh.sharingsid),sh.tabid,sh.sharingstype,GROUP_CONCAT(u.last_name) shared,u2.last_name whoshared from ec_customsharings sh left join ec_users u on sh.shared = u.id left join ec_users u2 on sh.whoshared = u2.id where tabid = #{tabid} GROUP BY sh.sharingsid ;
